mapper.select: SELECT code_id, SUBSTR(code_id, 2) AS code_id_no_prefix, code_nm, yn FROM tb_code WHERE grp_id = #{grpId} AND (vend_id IS NULL OR vend_id = #{vendId}) ORDER BY SUBSTR(code_id, 2) ASC
SELECT COUNT(grp_id) FROM tb_code_grp WHERE oprtr_yn = 'N' AND grp_id = #{grpId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_code WHERE grp_id = #{grpId} AND code_id LIKE SUBSTR(#{grpId}, 1, 1) || '%' ) THEN SUBSTR(#{grpId}, 1, 1) || TO_CHAR(max_num + 1) ELSE TO_CHAR(max_num + 1) END AS next_code_id FROM ( SELECT NVL( MAX( TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(code_id, '[^0-9]', '')) ), 0) AS max_num FROM tb_code WHERE grp_id = #{grpId})
INSERT INTO tb_code (code_id, grp_id, code_nm, yn, vend_id) SELECT #{codeId}, #{grpId}, #{codeNm}, #{yn}, #{vendId} FROM dual WHERE (#{vendId} IS NULL OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_vend v WHERE v.vend_id = #{vendId})) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_code_grp g WHERE g.grp_id = #{grpId})
